text: I'm trying to run a notebook in vscode, but it appears hard to get the julia kernel started, it insists on starting a python kernel and switching does not work. I managed to get one notebook up and running, but trying on another one I can't seem to get it to work. Is this feature working properly?

text: The whole notebook stuff is all WIP, at best :slightly_smiling_face: We are working with the MS folks to tightly integrate our extension with the Jupyter extension, my hope is to have that all done by Juliacon.
